metadata.title: CVE-2014-2750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2014-2744,CVE-2014-2745.  Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2014-2744and/or CVE-2014-2745.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2014-2744and/or CVE-2014-2745 instead of this candidate.  All references anddescriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidentalusage.

criterions.comment: prosody: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
